translation.en: My name is Lisa.
translation.ja: 私はリサ

translation.en: I am from the Village of Lupu.
translation.ja: ルプの村の者です

translation.en: I want to be a doctor.
translation.ja: 医者になりたいの

translation.en: You bang on my front door because you want to daub chicken blood on peasants.
translation.ja: 鶏の血で農民を癒やす術でも 習いに来たのか？

translation.en: Don't mistake me for a witch. Everybody out there already does that.
translation.ja: 私は魔女ではないし 使い古された迷信だわ

translation.en: I believe in science, but...
translation.ja: 科学的な医術を…

translation.en: ...I need to know more.
translation.ja: 学びたいのです

translation.en: I've exhausted my other options, and all the stories say the man who lives here has secret knowledge.
translation.ja: あなたが秘められた知識を 持っていると聞きました

translation.en: I am Vlad Dracula Tepes,
translation.ja: 私はドラキュラ･ ヴラド･ツェペシュ

translation.en: and I do not get many visitors.
translation.ja: 客人を迎えるのは珍しい

translation.en: What have you to trade for my knowledge,
translation.ja: 我が知識を授けたら 見返りは？

translation.en: Lisa from Lupu?
translation.ja: ルプの村のリサよ

translation.en: Perhaps I could help you relearn some manners.
translation.ja: 礼儀の授業はどうかしら？

translation.en: I've crossed the threshold of your home, and you haven't offered me a drink or even to take my coat.
translation.ja: お客に対して 飲み物も勧めないのですね

translation.en: What if I took a drink from you?
translation.ja: 飲み物はそなたかも

translation.en: Or have you loaded yourself with silver, crosses,
translation.ja: 銀や十字架で 身を守っているか？

translation.en: and garlic in superstitious fear?
translation.ja: それともニンニクを？

translation.en: I might have eaten some roasted garlic earlier. Was that rude? I- it was all I had left.
translation.ja: 来る前に食べてきましたが 失礼でしたか？

translation.en: I'm really not interested in superstition,
translation.ja: 迷信に興味はありません

translation.en: or being some muttering wise woman cheating people with boiled nettles and entrails.
translation.ja: 雑草の煮込みで 人々をだますのではなく

translation.en: I want to heal people.
translation.ja: 治療したいのです

translation.en: I want to learn. Will you help me?
translation.ja: 学ぶのを 助けてくれませんか？

translation.en: You are definitely different to most humans I have met in recent times.
translation.ja: 近頃の典型的な人間どもと そなたは違うようだ

translation.en: Maybe I can teach you to like people again,
translation.ja: 人付き合いを教えましょうか

translation.en: or at least tolerate them, or stop putting them on sticks.
translation.ja: 少なくとも串刺しにせず 我慢できるように…

translation.en: I gave that up a long time ago.
translation.ja: とっくに やめている

translation.en: Where is Lupu Village?
translation.ja: ルプの村は どこにある？

translation.en: You don't travel much.
translation.ja: 外出しないのね

translation.en: I can travel. This entire structure is a traveling machine.
translation.ja: この屋敷があれば いつでも旅ができる

translation.en: But... you don't. Do you?
translation.ja: でも行かないのでしょう？

translation.en: Maybe you should. The world is changing.
translation.ja: 世の中は変化しています

translation.en: Travel, like people do. You might like it.
translation.ja: 歩いて回るのも楽しいかも

translation.en: I've known you two minutes, and you offer for me to walk the earth like an ordinary peasant
translation.ja: 愚かな農民のように 地べたを旅しろというのか

translation.en: while I give you the knowledge of immortals,
translation.ja: 我が知識と引き換えに？

translation.en: the true science.
translation.ja: 真の科学だ

translation.en: My.
translation.ja: すごい

translation.en: They won't be peasants anymore if you teach them.
translation.ja: 知識を皆に授けてください

translation.en: They won't live such short, scared lives if they have real medicine.
translation.ja: 本物の薬があれば 死の恐怖も和らぎ―

translation.en: They won't be superstitious if they learn how the world really works.
translation.ja: 世の仕組みを知れば 迷信も消えます

translation.en: Why should I do that?
translation.ja: 何のために？

translation.en: To make the world better.
translation.ja: 世界を良くするの

translation.en: Start with me, and I'll start with you.
translation.ja: 私たちは お互い学び合える

translation.en: I think I might like you.
translation.ja: そなたが気に入った

translation.en: So there were devil engines in her house, Bishop?
translation.ja: 女の家に悪魔の機械が？

translation.en: I saw them with my own eyes.
translation.ja: この目で しかと見た

translation.en: And glass in shapes you've never seen, thin as paper.
translation.ja: 見たこともない形の 紙のように薄いガラスや―

translation.en: Lightning. Strange weeds and tools.
translation.ja: 稲妻や不気味な草 そして道具も

translation.en: Witch's things.
translation.ja: 魔女の証拠だ

translation.en: Of all the witches I've rooted out, none had such a collection.
translation.ja: これまで狩った中でも 群を抜いている

translation.en: And it had to come to this?
translation.ja: だから火あぶりに？

translation.en: She called it all science, Mayor.
translation.ja: “科学”だと訴えているが

translation.en: Lisa Tepes of Lupu was so far gone
translation.ja: リサ･ツェペシュは手遅れだ

translation.en: that she just couldn't see that it was all given to her by Satan.
translation.ja: 魔王の導きを盲信している

translation.en: I've made some small study of the chemical sciences myself, you know.
translation.ja: 私も少々 薬学を たしなんでいるが…

translation.en: J- just a study, of course. I- I'd never think to practice such things.
translation.ja: もちろん 理論を学ぶだけで 実践はしないぞ

translation.en: The Archbishop would prefer that life in Wallachia be kept simple, Mayor.
translation.ja: 大主教も 生命の営みを 自然に保つことを望んでいる

translation.en: Simple. Pure. Good.
translation.ja: 自然で純粋なままの 生命こそ善良だ

translation.en: Don't hurt them! They don't understand!
translation.ja: 彼らを傷つけてはダメ

translation.en: Who's she talking to?
translation.ja: 誰に話しかけている？

translation.en: I believe she's exhorting Satan not to take revenge on us,
translation.ja: 我々に復讐(ふくしゅう)せぬよう 魔王に訴えている

translation.en: which I suppose is almost commendable, for a witch.
translation.ja: 魔女にしては 見上げた態度といえよう

translation.en: Perhaps I'll say a prayer for her. A small one.
translation.ja: 後で少し祈りを 捧げてやってもいい

translation.en: I know it's not your fault, but...
translation.ja: 酷な頼みかもしれない

translation.en: if you can hear... they don't know what they're doing.
translation.ja: でも 彼らは何をしてるか 分かっていないの

translation.en: Be better than them. Please!
translation.ja: 復讐のために 身を落とさないで

translation.en: Are you Mr. Tepes?
translation.ja: ツェペシュさん？

translation.en: She talked about you.
translation.ja: リサに聞いたわ

translation.en: What happened?
translation.ja: 何があった？

translation.en: Where is my wife?
translation.ja: 私の妻はどこだ？

translation.en: Ohh. The Bishop took her. Witchcraft, he said.
translation.ja: 魔女と疑われて 主教に捕らえられました

translation.en: They're burning her at the stake.
translation.ja: 火あぶりにすると

translation.en: She was good to me, your wife.
translation.ja: 親切な方でした

translation.en: A good doctor.
translation.ja: いいお医者様よ

translation.en: It's not right what happened.
translation.ja: こんなの間違っています

translation.en: Where are they holding her? The cathedral?
translation.ja: 彼女は大聖堂に？

translation.en: Oh. Oh, no, sir.
translation.ja: 残念ですが 旦那様

translation.en: Sh- she'll be dead by now.
translation.ja: もう亡くなったはず

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何だと？

translation.en: I couldn't be there.
translation.ja: 見ていられなかった

translation.en: I don't care what they say. I won't take joy in that woman being killed by the Church.
translation.ja: 火刑を楽しむことなど 私にはできません

translation.en: I'm here remembering her instead.
translation.ja: ここで彼女をしのびます

translation.en: She said to me,
translation.ja: 妻に言われた

translation.en: if you would love me as a man, then live as a man.
translation.ja: “私を愛するなら 人間のように生き―”

translation.en: Travel as a man.
translation.ja: “旅をして”と

translation.en: She said you were traveling.
translation.ja: 旅の最中だと聞いたわ

translation.en: I was.
translation.ja: そうだ

translation.en: The way men do.
translation.ja: 人間がやるように―

translation.en: Slowly.
translation.ja: 時間をかけて

translation.en: No more.
translation.ja: もう終わりだ

translation.en: I do this last kindness in her name,
translation.ja: 妻に免じて 最後の情けをかけよう

translation.en: she who loved you humans and cared for your ills.
translation.ja: 彼女は人間を愛し 病を癒やそうとした

translation.en: Take your family and leave Wallachia tonight.
translation.ja: 今夜中に家族を連れて ワラキアを離れろ

translation.en: Pack and go, and do not look back...
translation.ja: 荷をまとめて出発し 決して振り返るな

translation.en: ...for no more do I travel as a man.
translation.ja: もう人間のように旅はしない

translation.en: Ah. There. Quite a show.
translation.ja: なかなか見ものだったな

translation.en: Drinks?
translation.ja: 飲み物でも？

translation.en: I should minister to the Archbishop.
translation.ja: 大主教の世話がある

translation.en: I fear he's not long for this world, to be honest.
translation.ja: 正直に言って もう先は長くないようだ

translation.en: Off to heaven with him, eh?
translation.ja: 聖職者の本望は―

translation.en: I suppose that's the ultimate goal for you priests,
translation.ja: 大主教と共に 天に召されることか

translation.en: serving God in His true house and all that.
translation.ja: 神の御前で仕えるんだろう？

translation.en: It holds little appeal for me, to be honest.
translation.ja: 私は あまり魅力を 感じないな

translation.en: Really?
translation.ja: 本当に？

translation.en: There's so much left to be done on earth.
translation.ja: 現世には問題が山積みだ

translation.en: Wallachia could be God's own country
translation.ja: ワラキアは神の国になり得る

translation.en: had I but time to burn out all the evil that hides here.
translation.ja: だが 悪を駆除する時間が 私にあるのだろうか

translation.en: What have you done?
translation.ja: 何をした？

translation.en: Satan!
translation.ja: 魔王だ

translation.en: What have you done to my wife?
translation.ja: 妻に何をした？

translation.en: In nomine Patris et Filii...
translation.ja: 〈父と子と聖霊の御名に…〉

translation.en: I am Vlad Dracula Tepes,
translation.ja: 私はドラキュラ･ ヴラド･ツェペシュ

translation.en: and you will tell me why this thing has happened to my wife.
translation.ja: なぜ妻を殺したのか説明しろ

translation.en: Oh, no! Oh, God!
translation.ja: 信じられない

translation.en: Dracula!
translation.ja: ドラキュラだと？

translation.en: He was supposed to be myth, a story made up by heretics!
translation.ja: 異端者の作り話じゃないのか

translation.en: She... she's a witch.
translation.ja: あの女は魔女だ

translation.en: Lisa Tepes was a woman of science,
translation.ja: リサは科学の人であり―

translation.en: and the one thing that justified humanity's stench upon this planet.
translation.ja: 人類の良心ともいうべき 数少ない存在だった

translation.en: You are not real.
translation.ja: お前は実在しない

translation.en: You are a fiction
translation.ja: 空想上の存在を―

translation.en: that justified the practice of black magic!
translation.ja: 黒魔術で見せているに 過ぎないのだ

translation.en: A fiction!
translation.ja: 空想だと？

translation.en: You take my wife and deny I even exist!
translation.ja: 妻を殺した上に 私の存在まで否定するか

translation.en: I give you one year, Wallachians.
translation.ja: １年の猶予をやろう

translation.en: You have one year to make your peace and remove any marks you have made upon the land.
translation.ja: その間に行いを悔いて この土地から立ち去るのだ

translation.en: One year, and then I'll wipe all human life from the land of Wallachia.
translation.ja: １年後 残った人間を ワラキアから一掃する

translation.en: You took that which I love,
translation.ja: 最愛の者を奪われた

translation.en: so I will take from you everything you have and everything you have ever been.
translation.ja: 代わりに お前たちから すべてを奪ってやる

translation.en: One year.
translation.ja: １年だぞ

translation.en: One year!
translation.ja: １年だ

translation.en: It will take me one year to summon an army from the guts of Hell itself!
translation.ja: １年あれば地獄の底から 軍隊を召喚できる

translation.en: No.
translation.ja: ダメだ

translation.en: What do you mean, no?
translation.ja: どういう意味だ？

translation.en: That woman was the only reason on earth
translation.ja: 人間の暮らしに 耐えてきたのは―

translation.en: for me to tolerate human life!
translation.ja: リサの存在だけが理由だった

translation.en: Then find the one who did the deed.
translation.ja: 首謀者を罰すればいい

translation.en: If you loose an army of the night on Wallachia, you cannot undo it,
translation.ja: 夜の軍隊を放てば 取り返しがつかない

translation.en: and many thousands of people just as innocent as her will suffer and die.
translation.ja: 罪のない人間も 何千人と死ぬことになる

translation.en: There are no innocents! Not anymore!
translation.ja: 罪なき者などいない

translation.en: Any one of them could have stood up and said,
translation.ja: 立ち上がって 反対の声を上げることが

translation.en: No, we won't behave like animals anymore.
translation.ja: 立ち上がって 反対の声を上げることが 誰にでも できたはずだ

translation.en: I won't let you do it.
translation.ja: 黙認はできない

translation.en: I grieve with you, but I won't let you commit genocide.
translation.ja: 僕も悲しいが 大量殺害は起こさせないぞ

translation.en: For twenty years have I served you and God
translation.ja: 20年にわたって あなた方と神のために―

translation.en: as the Archbishop to Targoviste Cathedral.
translation.ja: 大主教として 大聖堂に仕えてきた

translation.en: Yet never before have I felt the love of God
translation.ja: 今ほど深く― この街に注がれる神の愛を 感じたことはない

translation.en: shine so upon this great city.
translation.ja: この街に注がれる神の愛を 感じたことはない

translation.en: A little more than one year ago, many of us suffered a vision
translation.ja: １年と少し前に 多くの者が幻影を見た

translation.en: during the God- willed punishment of a witch in our midst.
translation.ja: 神の御心(みこころ)に従い 魔女を 処刑していた際の出来事だ

translation.en: The devil himself came to us
translation.ja: 悪魔が姿を現して―

translation.en: and threatened us with doom in one year.
translation.ja: １年後に人間を滅亡させると 脅したのだ

translation.en: And yet, here we are.
translation.ja: だが 我々は健在である

translation.en: The devil lied. Why should we be surprised?
translation.ja: 悪魔がウソをついても 意外ではない

translation.en: Do we not know the devil for a liar? Do we not know his works to be illusion?
translation.ja: ウソや まやかしは 連中の常套(とう)手段ではないか

translation.en: Of course we do.
translation.ja: 誰もが知っている

translation.en: Illusions and falsehoods hold no fear for us,
translation.ja: 幻影や虚言を 我々が恐れることはない

translation.en: for we are the righteous of Targoviste,
translation.ja: トゥルゴヴィシュテの 人間は気高く―

translation.en: living as if cradled in the love of God.
translation.ja: 神の愛に包まれて 心安らかに暮らしている

translation.en: One year.
translation.ja: １年 経ったぞ

translation.en: I gave you one year to make your peace with your God.
translation.ja: 神に ざんげする時間を 与えたはずだ

translation.en: And what do you do?
translation.ja: なのに何だ？

translation.en: Celebrate the day you killed my wife.
translation.ja: 我が妻を殺した日を 祝っている

translation.en: One year I gave you,
translation.ja: １年の猶予をやった

translation.en: while I assembled my armies.
translation.ja: その間に私は軍隊を集め―

translation.en: And now I bring your death.
translation.ja: 今ここに お前たちの死を もたらしに来た

translation.en: You had your chance.
translation.ja: チャンスをムダにしたな

translation.en: Kill everything you see.
translation.ja: 皆殺しだ

translation.en: Kill them all.
translation.ja: すべて殺せ

translation.en: And once Targoviste has been made into a graveyard for my love,
translation.ja: トゥルゴヴィシュテを 我が妻に捧げたら―

translation.en: go forth into the country.
translation.ja: 国の奥へと進め

translation.en: Go now.
translation.ja: 行け！

translation.en: Go to all the cities of Wallachia:
translation.ja: ワラキアの街々を破壊しろ

translation.en: Arges! Severin!
translation.ja: アルジェシュ セヴェリン

translation.en: Gresit! Chilia! Enisara!
translation.ja: アルジェシュ セヴェリン グレシット キリア エニサラ

translation.en: Go now and kill.
translation.ja: 今すぐ行って殺すのだ

translation.en: Kill for my love!
translation.ja: 我が愛する人のために

translation.en: Kill for the only true love I ever knew.
translation.ja: 私が唯一 心から愛した人のために

translation.en: Kill for the endless lifetime of hate before me.
translation.ja: この憎しみは 永遠に消えることはない

translation.en: So I says to him, It's my goat.
translation.ja: 〝ムルデヌ〞 〝グレシット 24ｋｍ先〞 言ってやった 〝ムルデヌ〞 〝グレシット 24ｋｍ先〞 〝ムルデヌ〞 〝グレシット 24ｋｍ先〞 “俺のヤギだ　４歳の頃から 世話してる”とな

translation.en: I been tending goats since I was four years old.
translation.ja: 〝ムルデヌ〞 〝グレシット 24ｋｍ先〞 “俺のヤギだ　４歳の頃から 世話してる”とな “俺のヤギだ　４歳の頃から 世話してる”とな 〝トゥルゴヴィシュテ １１３ｋｍ先〞 “俺のヤギだ　４歳の頃から 世話してる”とな

translation.en: Right, right.
translation.ja: なるほど

translation.en: And I'd know if my goat was in love with you.
translation.ja: ヤギが誰を好きかは ひと目で分かる

translation.en: For God's sake.
translation.ja: なんてこった

translation.en: He says to me, I know your goat's in love with me.
translation.ja: 奴が言うんだ “おめえのヤギは 俺を愛してる”と

translation.en: So you said how, Bosha?
translation.ja: なんで そう思うんだ？

translation.en: So I says how! And he says, Well, she fucks me, don't she?
translation.ja: “ヤギが体を許して セックスさせたから”だとよ

translation.en: And that's when you hit him.
translation.ja: だから殴った？

translation.en: Right across the eyes with a shovel.
translation.ja: 顔面をシャベルでな

translation.en: And now the headman says I have to pay the bastard money
translation.ja: 親方が言うには― 奴の目が見えなくなったから 金を払えと

translation.en: because he went blind.
translation.ja: 奴の目が見えなくなったから 金を払えと

translation.en: Not fair.
translation.ja: 不公平だ

translation.en: So I says to him, You didn't think he was gonna go blind
translation.ja: 目が見えないのは― ヤギとヤって 病気をもらったからだ

translation.en: fucking a goat with mange?
translation.ja: ヤギとヤって 病気をもらったからだ

translation.en: That would have been your fault, too.
translation.ja: それも お前の責任だ

translation.en: I would have gotten blamed for that, too.
translation.ja: どうしろってんだ

translation.en: But what am I supposed to do
translation.ja: 俺が見つけた時―

translation.en: when I find my goat laying on its side in the field, fucked within an inch of its life
translation.ja: ヤギは犯されて 半殺しになってたんだぞ

translation.en: and a naked man with blood and straw all over his peck?
translation.ja: 男はアソコを わらと血だらけにしてた

translation.en: Hit him with a shovel!
translation.ja: シャベルで殴る

translation.en: Fucking right I hit him with a shovel!
translation.ja: それしかねえだろ

translation.en: More ale for me and my cousin Kob!
translation.ja: いとこに酒をやってくれ

translation.en: Brother.
translation.ja: 兄弟だ

translation.en: Look, we might have had the same father,
translation.ja: 父親は 同じかもしれねえが―

translation.en: but you came out of my aunt.
translation.ja: 母親は俺の おばだろ

translation.en: Don't make me get my shovel.
translation.ja: 次に言ったら ぶん殴る

translation.en: Anyone else while I'm pouring?
translation.ja: 他に飲みたい者は？

translation.en: One over here.
translation.ja: 俺も お代わりを

translation.en: Ale! For Christ's sake!
translation.ja: おい 大変だぞ

translation.en: Piter!
translation.ja: ピーターか

translation.en: We was just wondering if you'd spotted any attractive sheep on your ride out.
translation.ja: そそられる羊でも 見つけたのか？

translation.en: What's the word, mate?
translation.ja: どうした？

translation.en: The horde's been seen, sweeping west!
translation.ja: 怪物の大軍が西で暴れてる

translation.en: Shit! You think they'll reach us?
translation.ja: ここまで来そうか？

translation.en: I think they might pass us by.
translation.ja: こっちは通らないかも

translation.en: I don't know. I hope.
translation.ja: こっちは通らないかも グレシットに 向かってるらしい

translation.en: I'm told they're closing on Gresit.
translation.ja: グレシットに 向かってるらしい

translation.en: Serves 'em right. Stuck- up bastards.
translation.ja: 気取り屋どもには 当然の仕打ちだ

translation.en: Ah, come on.
translation.ja: 言い過ぎだ

translation.en: No. No, it all comes down to the families and the houses, doesn't it?
translation.ja: 結局 原因を作ってるのは お偉い貴族どもだ

translation.en: The great houses of Gresit.
translation.ja: グレシットの名家だよ

translation.en: Vlad Dracula? An old family.
translation.ja: ドラキュラ･ヴラドも 首都の連中も皆そうだ

translation.en: The capital? All run by the great houses.
translation.ja: ドラキュラ･ヴラドも 首都の連中も皆そうだ 全部 貴族だが もっとタチが悪いのは―

translation.en: And they're not even the worst.
translation.ja: 全部 貴族だが もっとタチが悪いのは―

translation.en: The Belmonts?
translation.ja: ベルモンド家だ

translation.en: We should have killed all the Belmonts.
translation.ja: 皆殺しにすべきだぜ

translation.en: Shit.
translation.ja: まずい
